vue.util

Interface CoordinateConverter


  • public interface CoordinateConverter
    This interface should be passed as an argument of the views to convert physical unit from the models to pixel on the view
    Author:
    vcaen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CoordinateConverter DEFAULT_CONVERTER
      A simple converter that just return the given coordinate into a Point.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Point convert(int x, int y)
      This method allows to convert coordinate to an object Point
